title: Lending with Tsunami Finance
description: Discover Tsunami Finance, a lending and borrowing protocol on Aptos that enables users to earn interest on deposits and access liquidity by borrowing against collateralized assets.

tasks.title: Prepare for Lending Activities
tasks.description: Add at least 0.1 APT to your wallet to begin exploring Tsunami Finance

tasks.title: Tsunami Finance Basics
tasks.description: Understand what Tsunami Finance offers in the Aptos ecosystem
tasks.question: What is the primary function of Tsunami Finance?
options: NFT marketplace
Lending and borrowing protocol
Decentralized exchange (DEX)
Yield farming aggregator

tasks.title: Lending Mechanism
tasks.description: Learn how lending works on Tsunami Finance
tasks.question: What happens when you deposit assets into Tsunami Finance?
options: Your assets are locked permanently
You receive interest-bearing tokens representing your deposit
Your assets are converted to UST stablecoins
Your assets are staked in a validator node
tasks.correctAnswer: You receive interest-bearing tokens representing your deposit

tasks.title: Borrowing Model
tasks.description: Understand how borrowing works on Tsunami
tasks.question: How is borrowing structured on Tsunami Finance?
options: Unsecured loans based on credit score
Overcollateralized loans where you must deposit more value than you borrow
Fixed-term loans with defined repayment dates
Peer-to-peer loans directly between users
tasks.correctAnswer: Overcollateralized loans where you must deposit more value than you borrow

tasks.title: Interest Rate Model
tasks.description: Learn how interest rates are determined
tasks.question: How are interest rates determined on Tsunami Finance?
options: Fixed rates set by the team
Based on central bank rates
Dynamic rates based on utilization ratio of each market
Voted on by governance token holders
tasks.correctAnswer: Dynamic rates based on utilization ratio of each market

tasks.title: Collateral and Liquidation
tasks.question: What happens if your collateral value drops too low relative to your borrowed amount?
options: Nothing, you can keep your borrowed assets indefinitely
Your loan is automatically extended
Your position can be liquidated to repay the debt
You receive a warning and a 30-day grace period
tasks.correctAnswer: Your position can be liquidated to repay the debt

tasks.title: Asset Types
tasks.description: Learn about the assets supported on Tsunami
tasks.question: What types of assets are typically available on Tsunami Finance?
options: Only APT token
Only stablecoins
Major cryptocurrencies and stablecoins on Aptos
Only NFTs
tasks.correctAnswer: Major cryptocurrencies and stablecoins on Aptos

tasks.title: Health Factor
tasks.question: What does the health factor represent in Tsunami Finance?
options: The overall security rating of the protocol
A ratio showing how close a borrowing position is to liquidation
The user's credit score
The percentage of collateral that can be borrowed against
tasks.correctAnswer: A ratio showing how close a borrowing position is to liquidation

tasks.title: Platform Security
tasks.description: Learn about security measures in Tsunami
tasks.question: What security measures does Tsunami Finance implement?
options: Relies solely on the Aptos blockchain security
Has no security audits or measures
Code audits, economic security analysis, and risk parameters for each asset
Only relies on insurance policies
tasks.correctAnswer: Code audits, economic security analysis, and risk parameters for each asset

tasks.title: Flash Loans
tasks.question: What are flash loans in Tsunami Finance?
options: Small loans with short repayment terms
Emergency loans during market crashes
Uncollateralized loans that must be borrowed and repaid in the same transaction
Loans with flashing notification alerts
tasks.correctAnswer: Uncollateralized loans that must be borrowed and repaid in the same transaction
